title: zookeeper89
author: zookeeper89
content: What is the most money you have ever lost in one session? could be land base casino or crypto casino.mine was $200,000 on Stake.com 2 weeks ago

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: Quote from: zookeeper89 on October 31, 2023, 02:37:21 PMWhat is the most money you have ever lost in one session? could be land base casino or crypto casino.mine was $200,000 on Stake.com 2 weeks agoThis is ridiculous, loosing upto this amount is much, i don' think that I can afford to have something as big as this for gambling when am quite aware that i can loose everything at once if the game didn't come as expected, though there have been other bets that amount to higher figure than this, mine has been within the range of hundred dollars downwards because i don't use much money on gambling like that, be it land base casino or online gambling casino, i make sire to spend moderately base on what i can afford to loose.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Quote from: zookeeper89 on October 31, 2023, 02:37:21 PMWhat is the most money you have ever lost in one session? could be land base casino or crypto casino.mine was $200,000 on Stake.com 2 weeks agoI remember in 2015 i lost half of a bitcoin in poker tables, at that time Bitcoin wasn't worth much, but for today's price, it would be a $15k loss. And it happens in a casino called NitrogenSports. That casino is rebranded now to NitroBetting and now they only allow USA users, so, i can't play there anymore. $200k was a brutal lose, with that money you could start your own casino. I'm really sorry for your loss and i hope you recover soon. Now I'm curious, how did you lose that amount?

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Quote from: zookeeper89 on October 31, 2023, 02:37:21 PMWhat is the most money you have ever lost in one session? could be land base casino or crypto casino.mine was $200,000 on Stake.com 2 weeks agoI have never gone into deeper in gambling or stake a higher amount whereby I will have to loose something huge in gambling, I often gamble with what I can afford to loose. I can't just imagine myself losing huge amount like $200k in a casino were I know that gambling is a probability game which is not certain or defined that someone most always strike a winning.

comments.author: Ruttoshi
comments.body: Quote from: zookeeper89 on October 31, 2023, 02:37:21 PMWhat is the most money you have ever lost in one session? could be land base casino or crypto casino.mine was $200,000 on Stake.com 2 weeks agoDamn it mate, you must be a rich guy. This money is big enough to change the life of a poor man to become very rich down here in my country, and you just lost it in one session, gush. I have never used up to $100 in a session because my income is not big, and I only gamble with 5% from my income.What got over you that made you to gamble with such amount, you should not be influenced by those wealthy gamblers that stream their gambling activities, because they have more than enough to throw away. Gamble responsible and don't live to regret your actions later.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: Actually, $200k is a very high value for me personally, if I were in your position I would probably be busy frustrated regretting losing that much, maybe you are a rich gambler so the money doesn't mean anything to you so writing it here is like no burden. what you feel and that's great, most people who lose a lot will spend more time alone reflecting on their losses than writing and discussing on this forum.I'm not a rich gambler like you, maybe my biggest loss is your smallest loss, I once lost no more than $100 and at that time betting on sports last year since then I play smaller now so I don't experience many big losses at the moment. this, but maybe there is someone who experienced a bigger loss than you out there, I want to know more through this thread

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Well, it's fine if you are a millionaire like Drake but if you are as broke as earning less than 25K in a year, that is certainly a stash to cry about. What game did you play there?Having such an amount, I will definitely enjoy watching live sports matches while betting. There are more to enjoy than just gambling to make money in one session but yup sure there is a sense of pride when you lose big money.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: zookeeper89 on October 31, 2023, 02:37:21 PMWhat is the most money you have ever lost in one session? could be land base casino or crypto casino.mine was $200,000...It seems that you are a millionaire when you gamble with such large sums, although I can also say that I once lost twice as much as you, but without proof it is just another in a series of possibly fabricated stories. No matter how you look at it, it is very likely that you would lose that money sooner or later, because people gamble for the thrill of it, not for the profit, right?

comments.author: rdluffy
comments.body: Quote from: zookeeper89 on October 31, 2023, 02:37:21 PMWhat is the most money you have ever lost in one session? could be land base casino or crypto casino.mine was $200,000 on Stake.com 2 weeks agoI don't know if it's true or not, but 200k is a very high amount that I only see famous people betting these amounts of moneyWhat kind of game did you lose that bet on?I've never lost a large sum of money because I always limit my bankroll and if I lose it all, it's already a predicted amount and I don't bet again until the next day

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: Quote from: zookeeper89 on October 31, 2023, 02:37:21 PMWhat is the most money you have ever lost in one session? could be land base casino or crypto casino.mine was $200,000 on Stake.com 2 weeks agoYou gambled with $200,000 targeting to win what? This is money that can change someone life forever... far bigger than my five years target. Well, it is obvious you are rich and I don't think you need to gamble because you are probably richer than some of the companies you want to win money in   My highest daily loss in gambling should be $100 and that is a long time ago. I'm not a high risk taker and I believe in building small money to big amount over a long period of time.

comments.author: electronicash
comments.body: it's not the best year to lose a huge amount of money these days in gambling. even the rich as those poker players in the tournaments, they do regret losing such funds in an attempt to call and then fold later. can't imagine myself spending that much in one session but i would probably try my luck here and there with that amount. going to live baccarat table and then go roulette and quit before i lose 10k. not gonna give the casino the satisfaction of winning my money but because OP has deposited such an amount, i guess its all meant for gambling which means also meant to lose it all.

comments.author: Lorence.xD
comments.body: Quote from: zookeeper89 on October 31, 2023, 02:37:21 PMWhat is the most money you have ever lost in one session? could be land base casino or crypto casino.mine was $200,000 on Stake.com 2 weeks agoDang you must be rich then, cause even for some gambler, I think they won't reach that huge amount into one session of gambling, unless if you are very rich. That's actually big regrets if I was in your position cause I could do a lot of things with that money by just simply investing into Bitcoin, building a small business, renovate the house and buy also a motor vehicle for everyday use. I also gamble but it won't even reach $100 as I limit myself, of course sometimes I won more than $100 but I always stick to my limit so I won't get addicted as well trying to chase the loss. But actually damn, that amount could already support a lot of kids in my country for years, depends on the inflation rate.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: zookeeper89 on October 31, 2023, 02:37:21 PMWhat is the most money you have ever lost in one session? could be land base casino or crypto casino.mine was $200,000 on Stake.com 2 weeks agoYou have big amount of money. This amount is enough for many people to be successful in life. It is also good to start a business with huge amount like this than to be betting. Do not mind me, you are likely a very rich person and the amount of money may be small to you but if it is me, I do not know how rich I would be to bet as huge as this in amount of money.I have lost $500 at once before to gambling site. It was not a good day for me.

comments.author: TravelMug
comments.body: Quote from: zookeeper89 on October 31, 2023, 02:37:21 PMWhat is the most money you have ever lost in one session? could be land base casino or crypto casino.mine was $200,000 on Stake.com 2 weeks agoThat's huge money to lose in one session, but what can I say? I don't have that big money to begin with. But during the height of my addiction, I would say that I will go and lose $1k at least in one sitting in a card game in a land base casino. It's just a short time, maybe I was really unlucky that night that it was very quick and then I say that is the only money that I will lose, then next thing I know I will have to go to a ATM machine and withdraw more, again and again. So it was really hard to control once you taste that defeat and wanted to recoup and recover. Anyhow, not sure how are you going to be affected losing that big money and hopefully it's a money that you can afford to lose.

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: zookeeper89 on October 31, 2023, 02:37:21 PMWhat is the most money you have ever lost in one session? could be land base casino or crypto casino.mine was $200,000 on Stake.com 2 weeks agoA long time ago I know I lost my entire earnings for the week on a land base casino. I was encouraged by a coworker that the bet was from a reliable leak from an insider in the casino. The sad story was I lost the bet and had to struggle to feed for the entire week. But I am wiser now and would never gamble with such an amount.Quote from: 348Judah on October 31, 2023, 02:43:58 PMThis is ridiculous, loosing upto this amount is much, i don' think that I can afford to have something as big as this for gambling when am quite aware that i can loose everything at once if the game didn't come as expected, though there have been other bets that amount to higher figure than this, mine has been within the range of hundred dollars downwards because i don't use much money on gambling like that, be it land base casino or online gambling casino, i make sire to spend moderately base on what i can afford to loose. Maybe the OP can afford to lose as much as that. He didn't tell us his income so I am assuming he can afford to lose such an amount. But some persons might not earn as much as this in five years

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: zookeeper89 on October 31, 2023, 02:37:21 PMWhat is the most money you have ever lost in one session? could be land base casino or crypto casino.mine was $200,000 on Stake.com 2 weeks agoIt's not that I doubt that you really lose that amount but why not post a screenshot of that amount and just hide sensitive information, mine was over a year ago that $400 amount that amount is a month's salary of the minimum wage earner and I lose it in a land-based casino, it's easy to lose a big amount of money because of the ambiance on the land-based casino you tend to lose control of your concentration which lead to poor choice of bets.That $200k is so huge to lose I don't know your location or financial capability but with that $200k you could live like a rich man in a third-world country where everything is cheap.

comments.author: Kemarit
comments.body: Quote from: zookeeper89 on October 31, 2023, 02:37:21 PMWhat is the most money you have ever lost in one session? could be land base casino or crypto casino.mine was $200,000 on Stake.com 2 weeks agoI'm sorry to hear that $200,000 lost in one session. That money is already big in my country and I don't know if I can afford to deposit that kind of money in a crypto casinos. Might be interesting what kind of games you play though to lose that kind of money?Could be dice games or slots?Anyhow, I can't recall how big I have been losing in one session. But in the last traditional base casinos that I played, perhaps just around $200-$400. It's not that big as compare to you, but that is the money that I only bring in the casino and I played like 4 hours with my family and friends and so I did enjoy our session that time despite going home losing money.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on October 31, 2023, 04:20:02 PMIt's not that I doubt that you really lose that amount but why not post a screenshot of that amount and just hide sensitive informationYou are not wrong, anybody can come up with the idea that he lost an amount of money but which could be a lie, but with evidence like a screenshot, we can believe to some level. But do not always believe what you see on screenshot because it can be edited and fake.Quote from: robelneo on October 31, 2023, 04:20:02 PMThat $200k is so huge to lose I don't know your location or financial capability but with that $200k you could live like a rich man in a third-world country where everything is cheap.In a third world country? You can live like a rich man in any country in this world if you have that amount of money. If you are in a third world country, not that you can live like a rich man but you are a very rich man if you have that huge amount of money.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: zookeeper89 on October 31, 2023, 02:37:21 PMWhat is the most money you have ever lost in one session? could be land base casino or crypto casino.mine was $200,000 on Stake.com 2 weeks agoI initially wanted to write mine but on coming across the amount you have lost in one section I just decided to give up the thought, because mine would just be a change compare to yours.  But I’m still skeptical of this your amount; I have seen people complain about losing their account having such amount or something waka happened to their account but them losing this amount in a single go seems strange to me, except you’re super rich I think you’re lying.

comments.author: btc_angela
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on October 31, 2023, 04:20:02 PMQuote from: zookeeper89 on October 31, 2023, 02:37:21 PMWhat is the most money you have ever lost in one session? could be land base casino or crypto casino.mine was $200,000 on Stake.com 2 weeks agoIt's not that I doubt that you really lose that amount but why not post a screenshot of that amount and just hide sensitive information, mine was over a year ago that $400 amount that amount is a month's salary of the minimum wage earner and I lose it in a land-based casino, it's easy to lose a big amount of money because of the ambiance on the land-based casino you tend to lose control of your concentration which lead to poor choice of bets.That $200k is so huge to lose I don't know your location or financial capability but with that $200k you could live like a rich man in a third-world country where everything is cheap.Yeah, not that we doubt the OP, but when I check the bitcoin address he posted on his profile, it doesn't have any transaction yet. And that $200k in a land base casinos, you will be treated like a whale already and can get huge peaks or even a good stay in their hotel.But in just shows how gambling is, some of us here live in a 3rd world country or maybe in the States or Europe. However, we can still fell on the trap that majority of us will lose in a casinos, whether $100-$100k.
